product_name: Energizer Lithium e2 AAA Batteries - 2 Pack
long_description: This pack of 2 Energizer(R) e2(R) lithium batteries deliver long-lasting power to keep up with today's high-tech, power-hungry cameras and flash units. Last up to 5 times longer than ordinary alkaline batteries in high-drain devices such as digital cameras. Batteries weigh about one-third less than ordinary batteries and operate well in extremely hot and cold temperatures--from -40deg to 140deg F. For extra convenience, they come in a recloseable pack, allowing you to store extra batteries in their original packaging.
short_description: This pack of 2 Energizer(R) e2(R) lithium batteries deliver long-lasting power to keep up with today's high-tech, power-hungry cameras and flash units.
